title: Sacred Heart College for boys (TEFC)
brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Place Where Books Are Kept”.
Examines new techniques and attitudes towards the total library services in a Catholic boarding school for boys. Emphasises centralised resources, individualised study and production of new teaching aids. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
